            int x,
            int y)
Fires after the component is moved.

onResize

void onResize(BoxComponent component,
              int adjWidth,
              int adjHeight,
              int rawWidth,
              int rawHeight)
Fires after the component is resized.

Parameters:
component - this
adjWidth - the box-adjusted width that was set
adjHeight - the box-adjusted height that was set
rawWidth - the width that was originally specified
rawHeight - the height that was originally specified
